type.markdownDescription:
### `apoli:status_bar_texture`
Replaces the status bar textures (health, hunger, air, experience, etc.) with a specified sprite sheet.
## Power Type
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.

[Power Type Documentation](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/json/power/)

texture.description: The namespace and ID of the sprite sheet to replace the default one with. Here's what the vanilla sprite sheet looks like: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/misode/mcmeta/6d496b1a91476c4fdd45fdb093d0319141f9c109/assets/minecraft/textures/gui/icons.png
